coule ce qui reste

translation.en: there's a sewer line 2.4 miles from here.
translation.fr: donne sur les égouts à 3,9 km.

translation.en: Mikey! Let them know up there!
I'm on it!
Oh, no.
-Vern, go, go, go, go, go! -I'm on it!
[Foot soldier] Stop!
-Vern, hit the brakes! -Wrong way! Wrong way!
[Foot soldier] Go around! Go, go, go!
-Leo, move, move! -What?
[Vern] Opposite, opposite!
[Michelangelo] Oh, no!
How far off course are we?
Actually, we're on a bit of a shortcut.
But we need to keep going down. Straight down.
translation.fr:
Mais faut continuer
à descendre tout droit.

translation.en: Hey!
Just keep
going straight!
What's up, angel cakes?
Fire!
Guys, Leo's in trouble!
My shell's cracked. Just tape it up.
translation.fr: Ma carapace est fêlée, mets du scotch.

translation.en: Allow me to be the bad-ass for once.
translation.fr:
Laisse-moi être le gros dur,
pour une fois.

translation.en: Hang on, Leo. Disengaging.
God, I've always wanted to try this.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours rêvé de faire ça !

translation.en: I got you, brother. One car down, two to go.
translation.fr:
Je te tiens, frangin.
Une de moins, encore deux.

translation.en: Mikey!
All right, that's it. I'll take it from here!
translation.fr: Là, ça suffit. Je prends le relais !

translation.en: Raph, I'm driving! Yeah! [laughing]
O'Neil, what are you doing?
Yeah, that's good. Make sure you're getting everything.
translation.fr: C'est super ! N'en perds pas une miette.

translation.en: Vern! Vern!
O'Neil! Give me your arm!
Vern!
Avalanche!
[Donatello] Come on, Leo, wake up!
Yeah! If you wake up, I promise to do anything you say.
translation.fr:
Si tu te réveilles,
je ferai tout ce que tu voudras !

translation.en: Guys, Shredder's chopper is 20 miles outside of New York City airspace!
translation.fr:
L'hélico de Shredder
est à 30 km de New York.

translation.en: Thanks for the traffic update, Donnie. You doing sports and weather next?
translation.fr:
Merci pour l'info trafic,
tu fais le sport et la météo après ?

translation.en: If you're gonna be nasty about it, then I guess you don't want to know that there's a 500-foot drop-off in 53 seconds!
translation.fr:
Si tu te moques, j'annonce pas
la falaise de 150 m dans 53 secondes !

translation.en: -Are you saying there's-- -A cliff!
translation.fr:
- Tu dis qu'il y a...
- Un ravin !

translation.en: We gotta get April out of there. Raph, heads up!
translation.fr: Sortons April de là ! Raph, à toi !

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Don't forget that old guy!
Hi. Change of plans. Oh, come on.
translation.fr:
Changement de plan.
C'est pas vrai...

translation.en: Guys, get down! Get down!
[Donatello] Twelve seconds and we're going over!
Hey, Donnie, do that fancy slingshot thing!
translation.fr: Donnie, fais le coup du lance-pierre.

translation.en: We got to take Little Miss Sunshine out.
translation.fr: Faut faire sortir notre petite demoiselle.

translation.en: Batter up!
Grab on.
Mikey! Grab the cable!
I got it! I got it!
Hold on, hold on.
[grunting] Oh, no! No, no, no!
[sobbing] Oh, no...
Poor Leo, April...
and that other guy.
They were so young, so beautiful.
translation.fr: Ils étaient si jeunes, si beaux.

translation.en: [Raphael] They ain't dead, numb nuts.
Oh. Right on.
I hope you got a parachute under that shell.
translation.fr: T'as un parachute sous ta carapace ?

translation.en: Hey, guys! It's the maintenance hatch!
translation.fr: Les gars ! Le tunnel de maintenance, sauvés !

translation.en: Our ticket home!
[Leonardo] A little help, please!
[Donatello] Guys, we gotta hustle. Shredder's over New York City.
[Sacks on radio] Sensei, the mutagen is four minutes out.
translation.fr:
Sensei, le mutagène sera prêt
dans 4 minutes.

translation.en: Moving forward as planned.
[Michelangelo] Please keep your arms and legs inside the shell at all times.
translation.fr:
Merci de garder bras et jambes
dans vos carapaces.

translation.en: [Donatello] Satellite imagery shows Shredder's reached the top of Sacks Tower.
translation.fr:
D'après l'image satellite,
Shredder est à la Tour.

translation.en: If that's where he's releasing the toxin from... [Donatello] It's gonna spread all over the city!
translation.fr:
- De là, la toxine...
- ... contaminera la ville !

translation.en: -[Raphael] We need to... -[Donatello] ...break a left!
[Leonardo] All right, listen up. We gotta find the elevators and get up to the roof.
translation.fr:
Trouvons les ascenseurs
et allons sur le toit.

translation.en: You guys get out of here. Get to a safe distance.
No, no, we can go find Sacks and get our hands on the mutagen as a contingency plan,
translation.fr:
Non, on va prendre le mutagène
à Sacks, comme plan B,

translation.en: just in case... You know.
Thanks for the vote of confidence.
If we don't make it back, bring the mutagen to Splinter.
translation.fr:
Si on ne revient pas,
apportez le mutagène à Splinter.

translation.en: It can save his life.
translation.fr: Ça peut lui sauver la vie.

translation.en: Sacks' laboratory's on the 36th floor.
translation.fr: Le labo de Sacks est au 36ème étage.

translation.en: I've already disabled the security system.
Oh, and, uh...
Good luck!
If I don't return, remember me, April.
translation.fr:
Si je reviens pas,
souviens-toi de moi.

translation.en: You can always find me
in here.
You're a complicated chick.
Yeah.
Elevator's just around this corner.
All right, guys, listen up. We stick to my plan and we won't fail.
translation.fr:
Les gars, on suit mon plan. Il est infaillible.
On se déploie dans 3, 2, 1...

translation.en: Fan out in three, two, one.
translation.fr:
Il est infaillible.
On se déploie dans 3, 2, 1...

translation.en: Not the elevator.
Nope.
[Sacks] The first vial is filling with antidote now.
[Shredder] Initiating the toxin release procedure.
translation.fr:
Amorce du processus
d'épandage de la toxine.

translation.en: ♪ MC Mikey ♪
♪ MC ♪ [beat-boxing]
[Leonardo] Ready, stance!
Hey, Mikey, remember that thing you used to say when we were kids?
translation.fr:
Mikey, t'avais pas un cri de guerre
quand on était petits ?

translation.en: You made me promise never to say it again. Forget about that.
Still got one in the tank? I've been holding it in for years.
translation.fr:
- T'en as un en stock ?
- Et comment !

translation.en: Wait, guys, we need a plan!
-[Michelangelo] Cowabunga! -[turtles grunting]
[Michelangelo] Leo!
Yeah, we got a 10-10. Debris falling from the building.
translation.fr:
On a un 10-10,
des débris tombent d'une tour.

translation.en: Come on.
[Donatello] I got this, guys. I'll take him.
translation.fr:
Je gère, les gars.
Je m'occupe de lui !

translation.en: Come on!
[Michelangelo] Oh, no, you don't!
Seriously, you two...
You're adorable, really.
I could just pinch your cheeks.
translation.fr: je vous ferais presque des guilis.

translation.en: [Donatello] Guys, he's coming, he's coming.
Guys!
-[Michelangelo] Donnie! -[screaming]
[Donatello] Come on, come on!
[Raphael] Hold on, Leo!
[Sacks] I understand a girl with dead daddy issues. I do.
translation.fr:
Je conçois
que la mort de ton père te pèse, INTERRUPTION DE HALON

translation.en: But you're not gonna stop me.
This is history repeating itself.
translation.fr: L'histoire se répète. Ton père m'a pris sur le fait.

translation.en: Your father walked in on me, April, just like you did.
translation.fr:
Ton père m'a pris sur le fait. Comme toi.
Mais je l'ai abattu plus vite.

translation.en: It took a few less bullets to take him down, though.
translation.fr:
Comme toi.
Mais je l'ai abattu plus vite.

translation.en: [whispers] You killed my father.
[officer] Move! Move!
Go, go, go!
[Raphael] Come on, guys.
Got you!
[Shredder] Enough! The lesson is over.
Ugh! We're getting our asses kicked out there.
translation.fr: On se fait botter les fesses.

translation.en: We only got 50 more seconds before the toxin's released.
translation.fr:
Il reste 50 secondes
avant l'épandage de la toxine.

translation.en: Hey.
-Who wants to play Buck-Buck? -Buck-Buck?
-[Leonardo] What? -Buck-Buck. Tony-on-a-Pony.
Some people call it Johnnie-on-a-Rock.
[Leonardo] Wait.
Yeah.
Let's play Buck-Buck.
-[Donatello] But why would we... -No.
We do what Leo says.
translation.fr: On fait comme Leo a dit.

translation.en: Lead the way.
O'Neil!
Are you okay?
Look, just go get some help and take the mutagen with you.
translation.fr:
Prends le mutagène
et va chercher de l'aide.

translation.en: -Just go. Go! -No!
Just another day in the life of a man of action. [chuckles]
Oh! No, I'm not getting up.
translation.fr: Non, je ne me lève pas.

translation.en: You know how to use this thing? It's a simple command-line interface.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais t'en servir ?
- Interface en ligne de commande.

translation.en: No one's used this code in 15 years. I mean, I've read about it online.
translation.fr:
Vieux de 15 ans.
J'ai lu des trucs dessus, mais...

translation.en: But these kind of things take time.
Thinking there was no way I'd ever be in a position where the fate of an entire city... [continues indistinctly]
translation.fr:
J'imaginais pas
que le sort de la ville...

translation.en: I'll buy you some time.
[female voice] Toxin disbursement in five, four...
translation.fr: Dispersion de toxine dans cinq... quatre...

translation.en: ...three,
two...
Bam! System disabled! Who wants Italian?
translation.fr:
Système désactivé ! C'est ma tournée !
Tiramisu pour tout le monde.

translation.en: I'm buying. Tiramisu for everybody.
translation.fr:
C'est ma tournée !
Tiramisu pour tout le monde.

translation.en: [Leonardo] Fall in!
Hold on! Hold it, hold it!
If the spire falls and the toxin makes ground impact,
translation.fr:
Si la flèche tombe à terre
et que la toxine se répand,

translation.en: it'll contaminate a ten-block radius!
translation.fr: ça contaminera dix pâtés de maisons !

translation.en: What are the odds of us stopping that from happening?
I'll take it. Nobody moves, no matter what.
translation.fr: Ça le fait. Bougez pas, quoi qu'il arrive.

translation.en: [Michelangelo] But, Leo... [Leonardo] I said nobody moves!
translation.fr:
- Mais Leo...
- Bougez pas, j'ai dit !

translation.en: Leo, I'm letting go!
Shredder!
This is all that's left!
[Shredder] Little girl.
That belongs to me.
[Leonardo] Hold on! Hold on! Hold it!
[officer] Get back! All the way back!
translation.fr: SERVICE DE POLICE DE NEW YORK Reculez !

translation.en: April!
[Raphael] Come on, guys.
[Raphael] April!
[Leonardo] Got you, Raph.
Hold on! Hold on. April.
[Raphael] I got you.
Swing me towards him!
Do it.
[Raphael] Leo!
That's my girl. [sighs]
I think this is it, guys!
Does anyone have anything they want to say?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a un dernier truc à dire ?

translation.en: Donnie?
I'm the one who licks the icing off the Pop-Tarts every morning and puts them back in the box.
translation.fr:
C'est moi qui lèche le glaçage des gâteaux
et les remets dans la boîte.

translation.en: -[April] No, no, no, no! -[all screaming]
I so did not understand the ending of Lost.
translation.fr: J'ai rien capté à la fin de Lost !

translation.en: [Leonardo] Raph?
I just, uh...
If this is our last moment together,
translation.fr: Si ce sont nos derniers instants,

translation.en: I just want you guys to know I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I was so hard on you.
translation.fr: d'avoir été si dur avec vous.

translation.en: Every time I pushed you, I... I threatened you,
translation.fr:
Si je vous ai bousculés, menacés, crié dessus,
poussés au-delà de vos limites,

translation.en: I yelled at you, I pushed you beyond your limits,
translation.fr:
menacés, crié dessus,
poussés au-delà de vos limites,

translation.en: it was because I believe in you!
translation.fr: c'est parce que je crois en vous.

translation.en: I believe in each one of you!
I believe in your spirit, and your intelligence,
translation.fr:
Je crois à votre courage,
votre intelligence,

translation.en: and your potential.
And every time I talked about walking away,
translation.fr: Quand je menaçais de tout lâcher,

translation.en: it was because I was scared!
I just didn't think I was good enough to stand next to you
translation.fr:
Je trouvais que je ne méritais pas
d'être à vos côtés,

translation.en: and call you brothers, and say to you,
translation.fr: de vous appeler "frères" et de vous dire...

translation.en: "I love you!"
I love you guys so much!
[Donatello] Raph?
We made it.
Are you crying?
No, ding-dong. It's just a little dusty out here.
translation.fr: Non, tête d'œuf. J'ai une poussière dans l'œil.

translation.en: [Donatello] Okay, the mutagen is now entering his bloodstream.
translation.fr: Le mutagène pénètre dans son sang.

translation.en: Master Splinter? Nothing's happening.
translation.fr:
- Maître Splinter ?
- Il se passe rien.

translation.en: Why isn't it working yet?
[weakly] Mikey...
-[Michelangelo] Huh? -Mikey, come closer.
What did he say? What did he say?
He said, "Please get your knee off my chest."
-[chuckling in relief] -Sensei!
You're alive! It worked!
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes vivant !
- Ça a marché.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This was all my fault.
translation.fr: Pardon. Tout est de ma faute.

translation.en: You were right. We weren't ready.
translation.fr: Vous aviez raison. On n'était pas prêts.

translation.en: No.
It was I who wasn't ready to let you go.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui n'étais pas prêt à vous laisser partir.

translation.en: All you needed was to discover
that your true power lies in believing in one another.
translation.fr: que votre véritable pouvoir, c'est de croire les uns en les autres.

translation.en: There she is.
New York's secret weapon.
How's your arm, Vern?
Well, it wouldn't be much use in a fight. Not that I was much use before, but...
translation.fr:
Je ne serais pas efficace au combat,
mais je ne l'ai jamais été.

translation.en: -Did you get a new car? -Yeah.
You're looking at the new Fenwick Express.
Pretty sweet, huh? Kind of an upgrade.
I figured I'd need new wheels after my old work vehicle went boom.
translation.fr:
Il me fallait une caisse,
après le "boum" de l'autre.

translation.en: Yeah, Channel 6 gave it to me. They said don't put a scratch on it,
translation.fr: Cadeau de Canal 6, interdit de l'abîmer.

translation.en: but, like, lightning's going to strike twice?
translation.fr: Mais la foudre ne frappera pas deux fois.

translation.en: So, is that why you called me here,
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu m'as fait venir ?

translation.en: to talk about your new car?
I know that you're not exactly a fancy restaurant kind of girl,
translation.fr:
Tu n'es pas du genre
à aimer les restos chics.

translation.en: so I figured a creepy underpass in an abandoned neighborhood in the middle of the night was more your speed.
translation.fr:
Une ruelle craignos en pleine nuit,
c'est davantage ton truc.

translation.en: I wanted you to be comfortable.
translation.fr: Je voulais que tu te sentes à l'aise.

translation.en: [beat-boxing] DJ Mikey in the house!
What are you guys doing here?
We figured we owed you a thanks for keeping our secret.
translation.fr: On voulait te remercier d'avoir gardé notre secret.

translation.en: You know, you had a lot to gain from telling people about us,
translation.fr: Tu avais beaucoup à gagner en le révélant.

translation.en: but you had our backs.
Yeah, 'cause that's what family's for, Raph.
translation.fr: La famille, ça sert à ça, Raph.

translation.en: So you guys are driving now?
Yeah, man. I pimped this bad boy out.
Got a 42-inch plasma with the NBA package, shave ice machine,
translation.fr:
Écran plasma, bouquet sport,
machine à glaces,

translation.en: 7.1 digital surround sound.
Check the bass, brah.
My bad. I'm still figuring out the buttons.
translation.fr:
Méga boulette !
Je me trompe encore de boutons.

translation.en: That was my new Fenwick Express!
I just... I just got that.
We better get out of here. Want a ride home?
translation.fr: Vaut mieux pas traîner ici. On vous ramène ?

translation.en: You know what? I think we're gonna take the subway.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on va prendre le métro.

translation.en: We're going to take the subway.
[Michelangelo] You sure?
I got a real nice song that's all cued up.
-It's special, girl. -[Raphael] No, don't.
-For us. -[Leonardo] Come on, Mikey.
[Donatello] No, no, no, Mikey, you promised.
[Michelangelo] It's happening.
translation.fr:
Et si ! - Imagine toi et moi, c'est ce que je fais
- Arrête !

translation.en: -♪ Imagine me and you I do ♪ -Stop singing right now.
translation.fr:
- Imagine toi et moi, c'est ce que je fais
- Arrête !

translation.en: -♪ I think about you Day and night ♪ -[turtles clamoring]
translation.fr:
Je pense à toi jour et nuit
et c'est bien normal

translation.en: ♪ It's only right To think about... ♪
translation.fr:
Je pense à toi jour et nuit
et c'est bien normal De penser à...

translation.en: [Michelangelo] I'm making really good headway!
[turtles] Shut up, Mikey!
-[song playing on stereo] -♪ I can't see me Loving nobody but you ♪
translation.fr:
Je ne peux me voir aimer
personne d'autre que toi

translation.en: ♪ For all my life ♪
♪ When you're with me, baby ♪
translation.fr:
Quand tu es avec moi chérie,
les cieux seront bleus

translation.en: ♪ The skies'll be blue For all my life! ♪
translation.fr:
Quand tu es avec moi chérie,
les cieux seront bleus Pour toute ma vie !
